minetest mod which provides a simple node which can change color when sent a signal.

usage:

1. program a channel
2. send a digiline signal

```lua
digiline_send("test", 255) -- set the color to white
```

colors are indexed using the the following conversion table:

0. #000000
1. #0b0b0b
2. #222222
3. #444444
4. #555555
5. #777777
6. #888888
7. #aaaaaa
8. #bbbbbb
9. #dddddd
10. #eeeeee
11. #00000b
12. #000022
13. #000044
14. #000055
15. #000077
16. #000088
17. #0000aa
18. #0000bb
19. #0000dd
20. #0000ee
21. #000b00
22. #002200
23. #004400
24. #005500
25. #007700
26. #008800
27. #00aa00
28. #00bb00
29. #00dd00
30. #00ee00
31. #0b0000
32. #220000
33. #440000
34. #550000
35. #770000
36. #880000
